page.title: 10Life Styles (cont)
page.content: I stopped at the Pelican crossing pressed the button and waited for the green man to appear,indicating that I could walk across the road in safety.Iwas early at the bowl,allthe machines were turned off and it was very quiet.Suddenly allthe lanes were turned on and it became very noisy, bowling balls whizzing and the sound of skittles crashing when hit.After I walked back to Queens Square-I wanted to buy a record.The roads were now busy with traffic and the shops were full.Ladies pulling their shopping trollies and some families looking into shopwindows.Many young people gather around the Bandstand and dance to Electro music.The young people all wore different clothes. One in a leather jacket covered in chains and studs and his hair shaved, spiked and brightly coloured others smarter.
